Creatures

Many mobs dwell in the dungeon. Some of them are harmful, some not, and there is also another most rare kind - helpful creatures.

Check the list below:

( This contains only creatures unique for Remixed Pixel Dungeon )

Hostile

Regular Enemies

  • Elementals
  • Spiders
  • Shadow
  • Pasty mimic
  • Golden Statue
  • Zombie
  • Exploding Skull
  • Death Knight
  • Dread Knight
  • Lich (Mob)
  • Ice Elemental
  • Ice Guardian Core
  • Kobold
  • Kobold Icemancer
  • Cold Spirit
  • Enslaved Soul
  • Deathling
  • Shielded

Bosses

  • Lich (Necropolis boss)
  • Ice Guardian Core (Ice Caves boss)
  • Shadow Lord (Boss of Demon Halls)
  • Yog's Teeth (Yog boss component)

NPCs/Quest NPCs

  • Hedgehog
  • Stranger

Special Enemies

  • Armored Statue
  • Crystal
